thread.title: Condor Rapide expected back in service tonight
thread.title_full: Condor Rapide expected back in service tonight | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Condor Rapide expected back in service tonight
text:
Condor Rapide is expected to be back in service tonight after a technical problem meant this morning's sailings between St Malo and the Channel Islands were cancelled.
Last night, engineers on board Condor Rapide detected a problem with two of the four electrical generators.
All passengers were notified of the problem and have been booked onto alternative sailings.
The departure from St Malo is scheduled for 7.30pm.
I would like to apologise to the passengers who have been affected by this cancellation and thank them for their patience and understanding.
â€“ Alicia Andrews, Executive Director Last updated Mon 3 Aug 2015 Travel Guernsey Jersey
